name: Fade In Template
summary: Learn about .FADEIN.TEMPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create a FADEIN.TEMPLATE file, select File → Templates → Save As Template, name the file, choose the save location, and click Save.
To apply a FADEIN.TEMPLATE file to your opened FADEIN document, select File → Templates → Apply Template, choose your template, and click OK.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
